name: Seven Bloody Nights
description:
After stumbling across what you assumed to be abandoned mansion, you soon discovered that it is inhabited by vampires! Hot vampires! That may or may not want to drink your blood (and are possibly yandere for you).

You have seven nights to either find a way to escape or get them to fall for you.

Can you survive Seven Bloody Nights?

Warning:

This game contains some blood and slight sexual undertones

This game is meant for a older audience.

Right now this is only the demo

The Extended Demo will arrive soon
